name: Furious Vengeance
summary: Your enemy's blow fuels your rage and provokes your immediate retaliation.
description:
Your enemy's blow fuels your rage and provokes your immediate retaliation. Make a melee Strike against the triggering enemy.Traits

Rage: You must be raging to use abilities with the rage trait, and they end automatically when you stop raging.
trigger: An enemy within your melee reach critically hits you with a melee Strike.
